feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
